item.title: NASA’s Hubble Sees Baby Planets Colliding Around A Famous Star
item.description: NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope has captured infant planets colliding around Fomalhaut, one of the brightest stars in the night sky.

item.title: Here’s The Exact Time The ‘Stranger Things’ Series Finale Streams On Netflix (And How Long It Is)
item.description: This is when the very last episode of Stranger Things lands on Netflix.

item.title: Rare Cosmic Event May Be First-Ever ‘Superkilonova,’ Scientists Say
item.description: Astronomers have spotted AT2025ulz, a rare dual explosion — a supernova and a kilonova — that may be the first-ever observed “superkilonova.”
